CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Contract Signed stage positioned above or below the Negotiation stage?
SRP.A: The Contract Signed stage is positioned {below} the Negotiation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Negotiation?
VE.A: The value of stage Negotiation is {639}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Sale Closed?
VE.A: The value of stage Sale Closed is {278}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Negotiation, with a value of {639}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Post-sale Survey, with a value of {127}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Sale Closed to stage Post-sale Survey?
SC.A: Decreased by {151} Properties from stage Sale Closed to stage Post-sale Survey.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed?
SC.A: Decreased by {190} Properties from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Contract Signed to stage Sale Closed?
SC.A: Decreased by {171} Properties from stage Contract Signed to stage Sale Closed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 202? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Negotiation} stage has {639}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {449}, the {Sale Closed} stage has {278}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 202? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 63 and 544? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Contract Signed} stage has {449}, the {Sale Closed} stage has {278}, the {Post-sale Survey} stage has {127}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Sale Closed to Post-sale Survey, or from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Negotiation} to {Contract Signed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Sale Closed to Post-sale Survey, from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed, or from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Negotiation} to stage {Contract Signed} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Negotiation} and {Contract Signed} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Sale Closed} and {Post-sale Survey} stages.
